  • Field Details

    • winners

      private List<Player> winners
      List of winners of the game, updated after game is ended.

    • players

      private List<Player> players
      Players in the game. No player can be added.

    • connected

      private final Set<Player> connected
      Players connected in the game, I assume that no player can disconnect before playing the initial card an choosing the objective card

    • turn

      private int turn
      Keeps track of the player that is expected to play i.e. players.get(turn)

    • resourceDeck

      private final Deck resourceDeck
      Decks

    • goldDeck

      private final Deck goldDeck
      Decks

    • gameState

      private GameState gameState
      State of the game, used to know what move is expected

    • lastGameState

      private GameState lastGameState
      Used to track che state of the game, i.e. gameState, before the game is paused

    • sharedObjectives

      private final Objective[] sharedObjectives
      Objectives that every player can see

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<String> nicknames) throws PlayerNamesMustBeDifferentException, TooManyPlayersException, TooFewPlayersException
      Game constructor. Initializes Players with a starting card only. Initializes Decks. All players are then expected to place the card they were given.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - List of the UNIQUE names of the players that will be part of the game
      Throws:
      TooManyPlayersException - if there are more players than the rules of the game allow for
      PlayerNamesMustBeDifferentException
      TooFewPlayersException

  • Method Details

    • findPlayer

      private Player findPlayer(String nickname) throws NoSuchPlayerException
      Parameters:
      nickname - Player name
      Returns:
      The Player with the specified nickname
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException - If such a player is not in the game

    • isPlayerConnected

      private boolean isPlayerConnected(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - is the Player
      Returns:
      true if player is connected

    • checkState

      private void checkState(GameState expected) throws MoveNotAllowedException
      Parameters:
      expected - Expected game state
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - If the current game state is different from the expected game state

    • checkState

      private void checkState(GameState expected, GameState alternative) throws MoveNotAllowedException
      Parameters:
      expected - Expected game state
      alternative - Alternative expected game state
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - If the current game state is different from the expected game state

    • cardLeftToDraw

      private boolean cardLeftToDraw()
      Returns:
      True if a player can draw a card from one of the decks

    • placeStarterSide

      public void placeStarterSide(String playerName, Side side) throws InvalidStarterSideException, NoSuchPlayerException, MoveNotAllowedException
      After game initialization players have to place their starter Card
      Parameters:
      playerName - Name of the player that is placing the card
      side - Side of the card that is facing up
      Throws:
      InvalidStarterSideException - If the side does not correspond to the card
      NoSuchPlayerException - If such a player is not in the game
      MoveNotAllowedException - If the current game state is not PLACE_STARTER_CARDS

    • dealHandsAndObjectives

      private void dealHandsAndObjectives() throws NoSuchPlayerException
      After placing the starter Cards each player receives a GoldCard, 2 ResourceCards and 2 Objectives. Players must all choose which ObjectiveCard they wish to keep.
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(String playerName, Objective objective) throws MoveNotAllowedException, NoSuchPlayerException, ObjectiveNotAllowedException
      Allows a player to choose the objective they wish to keep
      Parameters:
      playerName - Player choosing
      objective - Objective to be chosen
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - If the current game state is not CHOOSE_OBJECTIVE
      NoSuchPlayerException - If such a player is not in the game
      ObjectiveNotAllowedException - If the player doesn't have that objective card

    • placeSide

      public void placeSide(String playerName, Card card, Side side, int i, int j) throws MoveNotAllowedException, NoSuchPlayerException, NotYourTurnException, PlacementNotAllowedException, InvalidSideException, InvalidCoordinatesException, InvalidCardException, NoAdjacentCardException
      Allows a player to place a card in their play area If there is at least a card left to draw, sets its PlayerState to DRAW Sets the game state to GAME_ENDING and ends the player turn otherwise.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The player that wants to play
      card - The card to be placed
      side - The side that will be visible
      i - Coordinate i in the PlayArea
      j - Coordinate j in the PlayArea
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - If it is not time to play a card or if the current game state is not GAME
      NoSuchPlayerException - If such a player is not in the game
      NotYourTurnException - If it is not the Player's turn
      PlacementNotAllowedException - propagated
      InvalidSideException - propagated
      InvalidCoordinatesException - propagated
      InvalidCardException - propagated
      NoAdjacentCardException - propagated

    • drawDeck

      public void drawDeck(String playerName, boolean fromGold) throws MoveNotAllowedException, NoSuchPlayerException, NotYourTurnException, EmptyDeckException
      Allows a player to draw a Card from a Deck Ends the player turn
      Parameters:
      playerName - Player name
      fromGold - true if the player wants to draw from the Gold Cards Deck
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - If the current game state is not GAME or GAME_ENDING
      NoSuchPlayerException - If such a player is not in the game
      NotYourTurnException - If it is not the Player's turn
      EmptyDeckException - propagated

    • drawVisible

      public void drawVisible(String playerName, Card visible) throws MoveNotAllowedException, NoSuchPlayerException, NotYourTurnException, InvalidVisibleCardException
      Allows a player to draw a visible Card Ends the player turn
      Parameters:
      playerName - Player name
      visible - the card to Draw
      Throws:
      MoveNotAllowedException - If the current game state is not GAME or GAME_ENDING
      NoSuchPlayerException - If such a player is not in the game
      NotYourTurnException - If it is not the Player's turn
      InvalidVisibleCardException - propagated

    • nextTurn

      private void nextTurn()
      Ends the current player turn. If a player has reached POINTS_TO_END points it allows each player left to play, such that everyone will have played the same number of turns. After everyone has played the last turn, it ends the game.

      If the following player is disconnected, immediately ends its turn too

    • endGame

      private void endGame()
      Adds the points to each player depending on the objectives they achieved. Selects the winner(s).

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String nickname) throws NoSuchPlayerException
      handles the disconnection of a player if a player disconnects before placing the starter Card, a random side is placed random if a player is disconnects before choosing the objective card , a random objective card is chosen random If a player is disconnects after placing a card but before drawing, a random card is drawn to end its turn correctly
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player to disconnect
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String nickname) throws NoSuchPlayerException
      handles the connection f a player previously disconnected
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player to reconnect
      Throws:
      NoSuchPlayerException - propagated
